mapper.insert: insert into sss_deliveryreceipt (deliveryReceipt_ID, start_City, end_City, mid_City, make_Date, state, comment) values (#{deliveryreceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sss_deliveryreceipt set start_City = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_City = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_City = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, make_Date = #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deliveryReceipt_ID = #{deliveryreceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select deliveryReceipt_ID, start_City, end_City, mid_City, make_Date, state, comment from sss_deliveryreceipt
